Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us, reflecting its unique features and benefits that we believe will be highly beneficial to you. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your needs or goals. Considering its unparalleled value, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at our suggested price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
